entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chibougamau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:15 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -37.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chibougamau Chapais Airport 05:35 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Haze
Temperature: -37.3°C
Pressure: 102.7 kPa
Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -50
Dewpoint: -41.1°C
Wind: WSW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 48 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the afternoon then clearing. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
